## Problem 1

```{Problem 1}
library(knitr)
n=120
Xbar=28
Ybar=3
SXX=2340
SYY=49
SXY=92
SSE=46

b1= SXY/SXX  
b0 =  Ybar-b1*Xbar
MSE = SSE/(n-2)
Var.b1 = MSE/SXX
Var.bo= MSE*{1/n + Xbar^2 / SXX}
sb1 = sqrt(Var.b1)
sb0 = sqrt(Var.bo)
tc=qt(1-0.05/2,n-2)
cbind(b1-tc*sb1,b1+tc*sb1)
cbind(b0-tc*sb0,b0+tc*sb0)
```
